TopicTitle: Alternative use of the research system?

Articles.Content: Are there ways and means of manually setting a research target (such as a waypoint) on a planet and exploring it by specifying an orbital altitude without using a crew? If so, how can the knowledge be rewarded by such an exploration?

On 2/17/2018 at 6:49 AM, hraban said:

Are there ways and means of manually setting a research target (such as a waypoint) on a planet and exploring it by specifying an orbital altitude without using a crew? If so, how can the knowledge be rewarded by such an exploration?

In career mode there are contracts where you can land on planets where an anomaly is using a waypoint given, I'm pretty sure you can make one using the mod below. but I don't know about an orbital waypoint. If you want to you can use the money cheat (ALT+F12 > Cheats) and unlock the whole tree and make the contract (contract mod below)                                                             

)
